title: CARIBBEAN_TREASURES
author: CARIBBEAN_TREASURES
content: I saved one Silver Moon to be Auctioned off because I had more people wanting them then there was available.    Up for Auction is #2 of 5 Caribbean Treasures 1/4 oz Silver Moon Bitcoin. Funded with 250,000 Sats and embedded with 1 diamond. DOGECOIN Silver Moon ----- #1-#5 SOLD OUTMonero Silver Moon ------ #1-#5 SOLD OUTLitecoin Silver Moon ------ #1-#5 SOLD OUTBITCOIN Silver Moon ------#1 SOLD OUT #2 Available , #3-#5 SOLD OUTSTARTING BID: 0.0121 BTC Fully fundedMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0002BTCEND TIME: SEPTEMBER 16th, 2023, 12:00:00 PST**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. Or other forms available just ask. SHIPPING: 0.00042 BTC to anywhere in the USA. I can Ship to MJ if you'd like.

comments.author: CARIBBEAN_TREASURES
comments.body: Quote from: 2stout on September 16, 2023, 06:53:54 PM0.0132Winning BID is 2stout with 0.0132 btcI'll contact you shortly with payment options. Congrats on a truly rare one

comments.author: rsincognito
comments.body: Dang I missed it .   Congrats to the winner

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Congrats 2stout. Lovely unique piece and yes, I missed it, too. Would have fired a few bids for sure.How about an Ethereum (  ) version?
